page.title: 02CREWE TOWN CENTRE
page.content: At first glance the shops around Crewe look very modern but when you look more carefully you notice the tops of large and small stalls look very old fashioned .It has just been modernised downstairs to make the shops look more attractive.There is a good choice of shops and usually you can find what you are looking for .Mostly Crewe has larger shops but there are a few small like sweet and grocery stalls.There is also a new pedestrian precinct with large shops. Around the centre the roads have been modernised and are now larger and wider.Most times of the day they are very busy .There are a few narrow roads by the market.It is enjoyable to shop in Crewe but although it is pleasent it could do with a few more relaxing areas.This would improve the town.
